intro: A magical sibling, a fluffy curse, and a valley full of curious creatures to befriend.
description:
Your sibling is a cat now. Time to fix that.

In Ashwood Valley, you’ll step into the shoes of either Luna or Draco – two magical siblings whose spell-casting mishap opens a portal to a vibrant world… and turns one of them into a cat. Now, it’s up to you to restore a ruined cottage, befriend quirky creatures, and uncover the secrets of the enchanted valley to break the curse.


Grow magical plants, explore changing seasons, complete odd quests for chocolate-loving mayors or cheese-obsessed dwarves, and pet all the wild animals you can find – even the strawberry cows!


With cozy farming, whimsical characters, and hand-animated pixel art, Ashwood Valley is a charming adventure about family, friendship, and a lot of fluff.


Key Features
- Farming with a magical twist: Grow seasonal crops, forage for rare ingredients like cinnamon, and tend a garden that changes with the seasons.
- Befriend and transform animals: Pet, feed, and discover hidden forms like mushroom chickens or beetroot cows.
- Choose your hero: Play as Draco or Luna, and try to reverse the feline curse on your sibling.
- Restore and decorate: Fix up your cozy cottage, clear out cobwebs, patch the floor, and make it feel like home again.
- Quirky characters and cozy quests: Help unique NPCs like Olaf the sailor-fisherman and Emma the chocoholic mayor with their oddball tasks.
- A living valley across seasons: Explore a colorful pixel-art world that transforms with spring blossoms, autumn leaves, and snowy winters.
